demo_data.title_en: Enter Deco Pic, open the seal. When the phone is in landscape mode, the direction of the seal does not rotate along with the landscape mode.
demo_data.title_zh: 进入Deco Pic，打开印章，手机横屏后印章方向未随横屏旋转（10/10）
steps_en: Landscape mode on the mobile phone
Check the status of the seal
demo_data.expect_en: The seal rotates in landscape mode on the mobile phone
demo_data.actual_en: The seal does not rotate when the phone is in landscape mode.
demo_data.actual_zh: 印章未随手机横屏旋转
